get.description: Returns NFT tokens owned by a wallet address with metadata and ownership information.

network_id.description: The Graph Network ID for EVM networks https://thegraph.com/networks

schema.description: Filter by NFT contract address
The Graph Network ID for EVM networks https://thegraph.com/networks

get.description:
Returns NFT collection metadata, supply stats, owner count, and transfer history.

The `spam_status` flag indicates if the NFT is likely spam. If status shows `pending`, retry in a few seconds.

Spam detection is supported for:

* mainnet
* base
